DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS SexFS v2.0 Brief Profile (Female) SFLUB001r Past 30 days How Often Become Lubricated During Sexual Activity or Intercourse Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response, in the past 30 days, of how often they became lubricated during sexual activity or intercourse, using a 5-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female) Past 30 days How Often Become Lubricated During Sexual Activity or Intercourse Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how often an individual became lubricated during sexual activity or intercourse._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

Concepts.longName: PROMIS v2.0 Brief Profile Sexual Function and Satisfaction (Female)
Concepts.definition: A 14-item self-administered questionnaire for adult women focusing on satisfaction and physical functioning during sexual activity.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Often Become Lubricated During Sexual Activity or Intercourse Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how often an individual became lubricated during sexual activity or intercourse.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Often Become Lubricated During Sexual Activity or Intercourse
Concepts.definition: A question about how difficult it was for an individual to maintain their lubrication until completion of sexual activity or intercourse.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per K. Laumann

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes ranging from 5 (Almost always or always) to 1 (Almost never or never).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened never or almost never.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened never or almost never.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A few times (much less than half the time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A few times (much less than half the time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened less than half the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened less than half the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Most times (much more than half the time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Most times (much more than half the time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened always or almost always.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened always or almost always.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
